titleInfo.title: 100 YEARS OF WOMEN IN CONGRESS ACT

extension.searchTitle: 100 YEARS OF WOMEN IN CONGRESS ACT; Congressional Record Vol. 162, No. 59

congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: 100 Years of Women in Congress Act
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H.R. 4570, to amend the Department of Agriculture program for research and extension grants to increase participation by women and underrepresented minorities in the fields of science, technology, engineering, and mathematics to redesignate the program as the ``Jeannette Rankin Women and Minorities in STEM Fields Program'', by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 377 yeas to 6 nays with 2 answering ``present'', Roll No. 153;

titleInfo.title: CAPTAIN JOHN E. MORAN AND CAPTAIN WILLIAM WYLIE GALT ARMED FORCES RESERVE CENTER

extension.searchTitle: CAPTAIN JOHN E. MORAN AND CAPTAIN WILLIAM WYLIE GALT ARMED FORCES RESERVE CENTER; Congressional Record Vol. 162, No. 59

congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Renaming the Armed Forces Reserve Center in Great Falls, Montana, the Captain John E. Moran and Captain William Wylie Galt Armed Forces Reserve Center
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>S. 719, to rename the Armed Forces Reserve Center in Great Falls, Montana, the Captain John E. Moran and Captain William Wylie Galt Armed Forces Reserve Center, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay of 387 yeas with none voting ``nay'' and 1 answering ``present'', Roll No. 154;
